abstract: Justice Dept says Lois Lerner, Internal Revenue Service employee at center of accusations that IRS denied certain groups tax-exempt status due to bias, will not face criminal charges.
lead_paragraph: The Internal Revenue Service official at the center of a political dispute over the agency’s scrutiny of Tea Party groups will not face criminal charges, the Justice Department said Friday.

headline.main: No Charges for I.R.S. Official in Tea Party Controversy
headline.print_headline: No Charges for I.R.S. Official in Tea Party Controversy

snippet: The Internal Revenue Service official at the center of a political dispute over the agency’s scrutiny of Tea Party groups will not face criminal charges, the Justice Department said Friday.
